Key Match Events: Trayce Jackson-Davis had 15 points and nine rebounds.
Draymond Green had 14 points and six assists.
Jordan Hawkins had 23 points for the Pelicans.
Brandin Podziemski finished with 13 points, nine rebounds, and eight assists.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Stephen Curry missed his second straight game with a left ankle injury.
Andrew Wiggins sat out consecutive nights because of low back tightness.
CJ McCollum and Herb Jones were absent for the Pelicans due to injuries.
Zion Williamson was held to 12 points on 5-for-20 shooting.
